string-array.name: phq_9_questions
string-array.item: Little interest or pleasure in doing things
Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much
Feeling bad about yourself-or that your are a failure or have let yourself or your family down
Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television
Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed, or are you figety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual
Thoughts that you would be better off dead, or of hurting yourself
